functionCodeQualifier.title: Function Code Qualifier
functionCodeQualifier.description: Code qualifying the function of a date, time or period. 137: Document issue date time.

references.description: A group of segments to specify the document or message to which the current message relates, and related dates and times.

referenceCodeQualifier.title: Reference Code Qualifier
referenceCodeQualifier.description: Code qualifying a reference: [ (AAS) Transport contract document identifier, (ABE) Declarant's reference number, (ACW) Reference number to previous message, (AFB) Cargo manifest number, (AGO) Sender's reference to the original message, (MS) Message sender, (SI) SID (Shipper's identifying number for shipment)

functionCodeQualifier.title: Function Code Qualifier
functionCodeQualifier.description: Code qualifying the function of a date, time or period. 137: Document issue date time.

parties.description: A group of segments to identify a party for the entire message including the message sender and related contacts.

partyFunctionCodeQualifier.title: Party Function Code Qualifier
partyFunctionCodeQualifier.description: Code giving specific meaning to a party: [ (CF) Container operator/lessee, (CZ) Consignor, (DEI) Means of transport operator, (GF) Slot charter party, (PQ) Certifying party, (SPC) Party responsible to obtain SOLAS Verified Gross Mass, (TR) Terminal operator, (WPA) Weighting party ]

contactFunctionCode.title: Contact Function Code
contactFunctionCode.description: Code specifying the function of a contact (e.g. department or person). [ (BN) Certification contact, (CW) Confirmed with, (MS) Message sender contact ]

equipmentDetails.description: A group of segments containing information about one packed container.

referenceCodeQualifier.title: Reference Code Qualifier
referenceCodeQualifier.description: Code qualifying a reference: [ (BM) Bill of lading number, (BN) Consignment identifier, carrier assigned, (SI) SID (Shipper's identifying number for shipment, (AOW) AOW (Submitter's VGM transaction reference) is mandatory. It is intended to provide an identifier for the VGM transaction that can be used to relate it to associated transportation documents, (FF) Consignment identifier, freight forwarder assigned [1460] Reference number assigned by the freight forwarder to identify a particular consignment]

measurements.description: A group to specify specify the gross mass of transport equipment and date/time when it was determined.

functionCodeQualifier.title: Function Code Qualifier
functionCodeQualifier.description: Code qualifying the function of a date, time or period.[(798) Weight ascertained - Date/Time when gross mass was obtained]

transportInformations.description: A group of segments identifying the means of transport and related details for a transport stage.

referenceCodeQualifier.title: Reference Code Qualifier
referenceCodeQualifier.description: Code qualifying a reference: [ (VON) Voyage Number]

documentMessages.description: A group specifying a documents and details related to it.

functionCodeQualifier.title: Function Code Qualifier
functionCodeQualifier.description: Code qualifying the function of a date, time or period. [ (137) Document issue date time, (798) Transport equipment verified gross mass ascertained date/time, (225) Verification date ]

parties.description: To specify the name/address and their related function, either by C082 only and/or unstructured by C058 or structured by C080 thru 3207.

partyFunctionCodeQualifier.title: Party Function Code Qualifier
partyFunctionCodeQualifier.description: Code giving specific meaning to a party: [ (AM) Authorized official, (OB) Ordered by, (SPC) Party responsible to obtain SOLAS Verified Gross Mass, (TR) Terminal operator, (WPA) Weighting party ]

contactFunctionCode.title: Contact Function Code
contactFunctionCode.description: Code specifying the function of a contact (e.g. department or person). [ (BN) Certification contact, (RP) (Authorised) Responsible Person ]

transportStageCodeQualifier.title: Transport Stage Code Qualifier
transportStageCodeQualifier.description: Code qualifying a specific stage of transport. [(20) Main-carriage transport]

meansOfTransportJourneyIdentifier.title: Means Of Transport Journey Identifier
meansOfTransportJourneyIdentifier.description: To identify a journey of a means of transport.

modeOfTransport.title: Mode Of Transport
modeOfTransport.description: Method of transport code or name. Code preferred.

transportModeNameCode.title: Transport Mode Name Code
transportModeNameCode.description: Code specifying the name of a mode of transport. [(1) Maritime transport]

transportModeName.title: Transport Mode Name
transportModeName.description: Name of a mode of transport.

transportMeans.title: Transport Means
transportMeans.description: Code and/or name identifying the type of means of transport.

transportMeansDescriptionCode.title: Transport Means Description Code
transportMeansDescriptionCode.description: Code specifying the means of transport.

codeListIdentificationCode.title: Code List Identification Code
codeListIdentificationCode.description: Code identifying a user or association maintained code list.

codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.title: Code List Responsible Agency Code
codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.description: Code specifying the agency responsible for a code list.

transportMeansDescription.title: Transport Means Description
transportMeansDescription.description: Free form description of the means of transport.

carrier.title: Carrier
carrier.description: Identification of a carrier by code and/or by name. Code preferred.

codeListIdentificationCode.title: Code List Identification Code
codeListIdentificationCode.description: Code identifying a user or association maintained code list: [(LINES) SMDG lines code list]

codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.title: Code List Responsible Agency Code
codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.description: Code specifying the agency responsible for a code list: [ (306) SMDG (Ship-planning Message Design Group)]

transitDirectionIndicatorCode.title: Transit Direccion Indicator Code
transitDirectionIndicatorCode.description: Code specifying the direction of transport.

excessTransportationInformation.title: Excess Transport Information
excessTransportationInformation.description: To provide details of reason for, and responsibility for, use of transportation other than normally utilized.

excessTransportationReasonCode.title: Excess Transportation Reason Code
excessTransportationReasonCode.description: Code specifying the reason for excess transportation.

excessTransportationResponsibilityCode.title: Excess Transportation Responsibility Code
excessTransportationResponsibilityCode.description: Code specifying the responsibility for excess transportation.

customerShipmentAuthorisationIdentifier.title: Customer Shipment Authorisation Identifier
customerShipmentAuthorisationIdentifier.description: To identify the authorisation to ship issued by the customer.

transportIdentification.title: Transport Identification
transportIdentification.description: Code and/or name identifying the means of transport.

transportMeansIdentificationNameIdentifi.description: Identifies the name of the transport means.

codeListIdentificationCode.description: Code identifying a user or association maintained code list: [(CALLSIGN) vessel callsign, (IMO) IMO number]

codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.title: Code List Responsible Agency Code
codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.description: Code specifying the agency responsible for a code list: [(11) Lloyd's register of shipping,(296) ITU (International Telecommunication Union)]

transportMeansIdentificationName.title: Transport Means Identification Name
transportMeansIdentificationName.description: Name identifying a means of transport.

transportMeansNationalityCode.title: Transport Means Nationality Code
transportMeansNationalityCode.description: Code specifying the nationality of a means of transport

transportMeansOwnershipIndicatorCode.title: Transport Means Ownership Indicator Code
transportMeansOwnershipIndicatorCode.description: Code indicating the ownership of a means of transport.

powerType.title: Power Type
powerType.description: To specify the type of power.

powerTypeCode.title: PowerTypeCode
powerTypeCode.description: Code indicating the type of power.

codeListIdentificationCode.title: Code List Identification Code
codeListIdentificationCode.description: Code identifying a user or association maintained code list.

codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.title: Code List Responsible Agency Code
codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.description: Code specifying the agency responsible for a code list.

powerTypeDescription.title: Power Type Description
powerTypeDescription.description: Description of the type of power.

locationFunctionCodeQualifier.title: Location Function Code Qualifier
locationFunctionCodeQualifier.description: Code identifying the function of a location.

locationIdentification.title: Location Identification
locationIdentification.description: Identification of a location by code or name.

codeListIdentificationCode.description: Code identifying a user or association maintained code list.

codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.title: Code List Responsible Agency Code
codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.description: Code specifying the agency responsible for a code list.

relatedLocationOneIdentification.description: Identification of the first related location by code or name.

firstRelatedlocationIdentifier.description: To identify a first related location.

codeListIdentificationCode.description: Code identifying a user or association maintained code list.

codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.title: Code List Responsible Agency Code
codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.description: Code specifying the agency responsible for a code list.

relatedLocationTwodentification.description: Identification of the second location by code or name.

secondRelatedlocationIdentifier.title: Second Related Location Identifier
secondRelatedlocationIdentifier.description: To identify the second related location.

codeListIdentificationCode.title: Code List Identification Code
codeListIdentificationCode.description: Code identifying a user or association maintained code list.

codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.title: Code List Responsible Agency Code
codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.description: Code specifying the agency responsible for a code list.

secondRelatedLocationName.title: First Related Location Name
secondRelatedLocationName.description: Name of the second related location.

transportUnitSealIdentifier.title: Transport Unit Seal Identifier
transportUnitSealIdentifier.description: The identification number of a seal affixed to a transport unit.

sealIssuer.title: Seal Issuer
sealIssuer.description: Identification of the issuer of a seal on equipment either by code or by name

sealingPartyNameCode.title: Sealing Party Name Code
sealingPartyNameCode.description: Code specifying the name of the sealing party: [ (AA) Consolidator, (AB) Unknown, (CA) Carrier, (CU) Customs, (SH) Shipper, (TO) Terminal operator ]

codeListIdentificationCode.title: Code List Identification Code
codeListIdentificationCode.description: Code identifying a user or association maintained code list.

codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.title: Code List Responsible Agency Code
codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.description: Code specifying the agency responsible for a code list.

sealConditionCode.title: Seal Condition Code
sealConditionCode.description: Code specifying the condition of a seal: [ (1) In Right Condition, (2) Damaged, (3) Missing, (4) Broken, (5) Faulty electronic seal ]

identityNumberRange.title: Identity Number Range
identityNumberRange.description: Goods item identification numbers, start and end of consecutively numbered range.

objectIdentifier.title: Object Identifier
objectIdentifier.description: Code specifying the unique identity of an object.

sealTypeCode.title: Seal Type Code
sealTypeCode.description: To specify a type of seal.

measurementPurposeCodeQualifier.title: Party Function Code Qualifier
measurementPurposeCodeQualifier.description: Code qualifying the purpose of the measurement: [ (AAE) Measurement ]

measuredAttributeCode.title: Measured Attribute Code
measuredAttributeCode.description: Code specifying the attribute measured: [ (AET) Transport equipment gross weight, (VGM) Verified gross mass - transport equipment verified gross ]

measurementSignificanceCode.title: Measurement Significance Code
measurementSignificanceCode.description: Code specifying the significance of a measurement.

nondiscreteMeasurementNameCode.title: Non-discrete Measurement Name Code
nondiscreteMeasurementNameCode.description: Code specifying the name of a non-discrete measurement.

valueRange.title: Value/Range
valueRange.description: Measurement value and relevant minimum and maximum values of the measurement range.

measurementUnitCode.title: Measurement Unit Code
measurementUnitCode.description: Code specifying the unit of measurement: [ (KGM) Kilogram, (LBR) Pounds]

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: To specify the value of a measurement.

rangeMinimunQuantity.title: Range Minimun Quantity
rangeMinimunQuantity.description: To specify the minimum value of a range.

rangeMaximunQuantity.title: Range Maximun Quantity
rangeMaximunQuantity.description: To specify the maximum value of a range.

significantDigitsQuantity.title: Significant Digits Quantity
significantDigitsQuantity.description: Count of the number of significant digits.

surfaceLayerCode.title: Surface Layer Code
surfaceLayerCode.description: Code specifying the surface or layer of an object.

equipmentTypeCodeQualifer.title: Equipment Type Code Qualifier
equipmentTypeCodeQualifer.description: Code qualifying a type of equipment.[(CN) Container]

codeListIdentificationCode.title: Code List Identification Code
codeListIdentificationCode.description: Code identifying a user or association maintained code list: [(6346) container ID according to ISO 6346]

codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.title: Code List Responsible Agency Code
codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.description: Code specifying the agency responsible for a code list: [ (5) ISO (International Organization for Standardization))]

countryIdentifier.title: Country Identifier
countryIdentifier.description: Identification of the name of the country or other geographical entity as defined in ISO 3166-1 and UN/ECE Recommendation 3.

equipmentSizeAndType.title: Equipment Size and Type
equipmentSizeAndType.description: Code and or name identifying size and type of equipment. Code preferred.

equipmentSizeAndTypeDescriptionCode.title: Equipment Size and Type Description Code
equipmentSizeAndTypeDescriptionCode.description: Code specifying the size and type of equipment.

codeListIdentificationCode.title: Code List Identification Code
codeListIdentificationCode.description: Code identifying a user or association maintained code list: [(6346) container ID according to ISO 6346]

codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.title: Code List Responsible Agency Code
codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.description: Code specifying the agency responsible for a code list: [ (5) ISO (International Organization for Standardization))]

equipmentSizeAndTypeDescription.title: Equipment Size And Type Description
equipmentSizeAndTypeDescription.description: Free form description of the size and type of equipment.

equipmentSupplierCode.title: Equipment Suplier Code
equipmentSupplierCode.description: Code specifying the party that is the supplier of the equipment.

equipmentStatusCode.title: Equipment Status Code
equipmentStatusCode.description: Code specifying the status of equipment.

fullOrEmptyIndicatorCode.title: Full Or Empty Indicator Code
fullOrEmptyIndicatorCode.description: Code indicating whether an object is full or empty: [ (5) Full ]

messageName.title: Document / Message Name
messageName.description: Identification of a type of document/message by code or name. Code preferred.

codeListIdentificationCode.title: Code List Identification Code
codeListIdentificationCode.description: Code identifying a user or association maintained code list.

codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.title: Code List Responsible Agency Code
codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.description: Code specifying the agency responsible for a code list.

documentMessageDetails.title: Document / Message Name
documentMessageDetails.description: Identification of document/message by number, status, source and/or language.

documentStatusCode.title: Document Status Code
documentStatusCode.description: Code specifying the status of a document.

documentSourceDescription.title: Document Source Description
documentSourceDescription.description: Free form description of the source of a document.

comunicationMediumTypeCode.title: Communication Medium Type Code
comunicationMediumTypeCode.description: Code specifying the type of communication medium.
